summary: It's the last week of June 2009. Andrea's parents left for a summer trip so he takes advantage of the situation to skip summer camp and make love for the first time with his girlfriend Eva.... See full summary »
cast: Cecilia Bertozzi|Giovanni Bissaca|Francesca Calabrese|Stefania Casini|Niccolò Gentili|Vittorio Gianotti|Remo Girone|Ivan Nick Kapalala|Cristina Marino|Leonardo Messerklinger|Tommaso Maria Neri
title: Maicol Jecson
